Name: LU 10 - Zoning, 2134 Coyle Street Rezoning, Brooklyn (C 210239 ZMK)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 210239 ZMK, a Zoning Map amendment (Preconsidered L.U. No. 10).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fnil\fprq2\fcharset0 Courier;}}

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Riley\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, Coyle Properties,\expndtw-6  LLC, filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 29a, by eliminating from within an existing R4 District a C1-2 District; changing from an R4 District to an R6A District; and establishing within the proposed R6A District a C2-4 District which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate \cf1 a five-story, 129,000-square-foot mixed-use development\cf0\f1\fs16  \cf1\f0\fs24 containing\cf0  120 dwelling units, approximately 36 of which would be designated as permanently affordable, as well as approximately 32,000 square feet of commercial floor area \cf1 at \cf0 2134 Coyle Street in the Sheepshead Bay neighborhood of Community District 15, Brooklyn (ULURP No. C 210239 ZMK) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on January 21, 2022 its decision dated January 5, 2022 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1440\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920 WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 210240 ZRK (Pre. L.U. No. 11), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area coterminous with the project area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7560\tx7920\tx8640\tx8933\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on January 27, 2022;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\highlight2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\highlight0\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Negative Declaration issued on August 30, 2021 (CEQR No. \cf1 21DCP123K\cf0 ) (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set for in the Negative Declaration.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 210239 ZMK, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 29a: \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\par
\lang4105 1.\tab eliminating from within an existing R4 District a C1-2 District bounded by a line 100 feet southerly of Avenue U, Coyle Street, a line 100 feet northerly of Avenue V, and a line midway between Ford Street and Coyle Street;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj 2.\tab changing from an R4 District to an R6A District property bounded by a line 100 feet southerly of Avenue U, Coyle Street, a line 100 feet northerly of Avenue V, and a line midway between Ford Street and Coyle Street; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj 3.\tab establishing within the proposed R6A District a C2-4 District bounded by a line 100 feet southerly of Avenue U, Coyle Street, a line 100 feet northerly of Avenue V, and a line midway between Ford Street and Coyle Street;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated August 30, 2021, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-620, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 15.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\lang1033\par
Adopted.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on ____________\ul ,\ulnone  2022, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
